com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Class RhizosphereLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereLoader

public final class RhizosphereLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Loader to inject Rhizosphere javascript libraries into the GWT host page. Exposes a callback mechanism to guarantee code execution after successful library injection.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Summary
 void ensureInjected(java.lang.Runnable callback)
          Registers a callback to be invoked after Rhizosphere libraries have been successfully injected into the gwt host page.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static RhizosphereLoader getInstance()
Returns:
The singleton loader instance.

setUseGoogleCDN

public void setUseGoogleCDN(boolean useGoogleCDN)
Uses Google CDN to load Rhizosphere libraries and its dependencies as much as possible.

Parameters:
useGoogleCDN - Whether the Google CDN should be used as possible to load Rhizosphere libraries and its dependencies.

ensureInjected

public void ensureInjected(java.lang.Runnable callback)
Registers a callback to be invoked after Rhizosphere libraries have been successfully injected into the gwt host page. If Rhizosphere libraries have already been injected, the callback immediately executes.

Parameters:
callback - The callback to invoke.
